description: This software adds a data handling module to the GNU Radio (GR) software defined radio (SDR) framework as well as some general-purpose function blocks (filters, metadata control, etc). This software is useful for processing bursty RF transmissions with GR, and serves as a base for applying SDR signal processing techniques to a whole burst of data at a time, as opposed to streaming data which GR.
name: GNU Radio Sandia Utilities v. 1.6
